test_step_fields.name: Data (data)
test_step_fields.description: Any data the related step requests (e.g., login credentials) to be used by the tester.

test_step_fields.name: Expected Result (result)
test_step_fields.description: The behavior that the step should accomplish.

test_step_fields.name: Action (action)
test_step_fields.description: The action to be reproduced by the tester.
